verses.verse: Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things,<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5254>tested<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H85>"Abraham!<s%>" And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Here<s%> I am."

And He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3947>"Take<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> your <S%H1121>son,<s%> your <S%H3173>only<s%> son, <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H157>love,<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4179>Moriah;<s%> and <S%H5927>offer<s%> him <S%H8033>there<s%> as a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> on <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> I will <S%H559>tell<s%> you."

So <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7925>rose<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> and <S%H2280>saddled<s%> his <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> of his <S%H5288>young<s%> <S%H5288>men<s%> with him and <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1121>son;<s%> and he <S%H1234>split<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> for the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H559>told<s%> him.
On the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H5375>raised<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> from a <S%H7350>distance.<s%>

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5288>young<s%> <S%H5288>men,<s%> <S%H3427>"Stay<s%> <S%H6311>here<s%> with the <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> and I and the <S%H5288>lad<s%> will <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H5704>yonder<s%><S%H3541>;<s%> and we will <S%H7812>worship<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> to you."

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6086>wood<s%> of the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and <S%H7760>laid<s%> it on <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and he <S%H3947>took<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> and the <S%H3979>knife.<s%> So the <S%H8147>two<s%> of them <S%H1980>walked<s%> on <S%H9191>together.<s%>

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham<s%> his father and <S%H1>said,<s%> "My father!" And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1>"Here<s%> I am, my <S%H559>son.<s%>" And he <S%H2009>said,<s%> <S%H1121>"Behold,<s%> the <S%H559>fire<s%> and the <S%H2009>wood,<s%> but <S%H784>where<s%> is the <S%H6086>lamb<s%> for the <S%H346>burnt<s%> <S%H7716>offering<s%>?"

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H430>"God<s%> will <S%H7200>provide<s%> for Himself the <S%H7716>lamb<s%> for the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> my <S%H1121>son.<s%>" So the <S%H8147>two<s%> of them <S%H1980>walked<s%> on <S%H9191>together.<s%>

Then they <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H559>told<s%> him; and <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> and <S%H6186>arranged<s%> the <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H6123>bound<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and <S%H7760>laid<s%> him on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> on <S%H4605>top<s%> of the <S%H6086>wood.<s%>
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7971>stretched<s%> out his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H3979>knife<s%> to <S%H7819>slay<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

But the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to him from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H85>"Abraham,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham!<s%>" And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Here<s%> I am."

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Do not <S%H7971>stretch<s%> out your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H5288>lad,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H408>nothing<s%> <S%H3972><s%> to him; for <S%H6258>now<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> since you have not <S%H2820>withheld<s%> your <S%H1121>son,<s%> your <S%H3173>only<s%> son, from Me."

Then <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H5375>raised<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> [him] a <S%H352>ram<s%> <S%H270>caught<s%> in the <S%H5442>thicket<s%> by his <S%H7161>horns;<s%> and <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H352>ram,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> him up for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> in the <S%H8478>place<s%> of his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that <S%H4725>place<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> Will <S%H7200>Provide,<s%> as it is <S%H559>said<s%> to this <S%H3117>day,<s%> "In the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> it will be <S%H7200>provided.<s%>"
Then the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham<s%> a <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8145>time<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%>

and <S%H559>said,<s%> "By Myself I have <S%H7650>sworn,<s%> <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H3282><s%> you have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> and have not <S%H2820>withheld<s%> your <S%H1121>son,<s%> your <S%H3173>only<s%> son,

<S%H3588>indeed<s%> I will <S%H1288>greatly<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> you, and I will <S%H7235>greatly<s%> <S%H7235>multiply<s%> your <S%H2233>seed<s%> as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H3220>seashore<s%><S%H8193>;<s%> and your <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of their <S%H340>enemies.<s%>

"And in your <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall be <S%H1288>blessed,<s%> <S%H6118>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> you have <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> My <S%H6963>voice.<s%>"

So <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to his <S%H5288>young<s%> <S%H5288>men,<s%> and they <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H9191>together<s%> to <S%H884>Beersheba;<s%> and <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> at <S%H884>Beersheba.<s%>

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things,<s%> that it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> <S%H4435>Milcah<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> has <S%H3205>borne<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> to your <S%H251>brother<s%> Nahor: <S%H5152><s%>
<S%H5780>Uz<s%> his first-born and <S%H938>Buz<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> and <S%H7055>Kemuel<s%> the father of <S%H1>Aram<s%>
and <S%H3777>Chesed<s%> and <S%H2375>Hazo<s%> and <S%H6394>Pildash<s%> and <S%H3044>Jidlaph<s%> and <S%H1328>Bethuel.<s%> "

And <S%H1328>Bethuel<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7259>Rebekah:<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H4435>Milcah<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> to <S%H5152>Nahor,<s%> Abraham's <S%H251>brother.<s%>

And his <S%H6370>concubine,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7208>Reumah,<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H2875>Tebah<s%> and <S%H1514>Gaham<s%> and <S%H8477>Tahash<s%> and <S%H4601>Maacah.<s%>
